column4: (on a side note, mplayer isn't letting me view my pr0n, this is unacceptable  ;)
why wont it let you view your pr0n?
dunno... just won't run files that worked prior to the last upgrade  :(
not really... inkscape is one interface, but nothing has the features of the GIMP
I know, but yeah, I was mainly pointing at the single interface for it... nothing beats GIMP for me though, not even Photoshop...
I haven't noticed *that* much... which is actually prolly a good thing  :)
not even that... its for people that can't think of anything else to waste clock cycles on  ;)
merging of AD between those is a pain *nods*
it will be in Hoary probably this weekend, you can't live with Xfree for a few more days?  ;)
hah... composite doesn't work yet, so you won't get that anyways  :(
no one wants a monolithic xserver though... thats not the direction everyone wants to take  ;)
isnt the x.org server that is going to be included in Hoary in the coming days going to be monolithic?
